name: Red's Colloseum
description:
"Do you think you are stronger than everyone else? Then prove yourself in Red's Colloseum!"

In Red's Colloseum you shoot your way through waves of enemies in a Top-Down Arena and even get the chance to destroy the void. You can move in a unique way by shooting yourself in a 360° angle. If you hit a blue wall you will bounce, but red walls are harmful.

When you kill an enemy you get tokens, which you can sell for two currencies which are used to buy upgrades to make you even stronger. After defeating the void the infinity-mode will start. You will be fighting unlimited, randomized waves of enemies. After defeating an enemy you will also get points, which are used to get new highscores.

If you think you are strong enough, then what are you waiting for? Download the game for free and prove yourself!
